Name: Animated Broom
Immunities: asleep, bleed, disease, death effects, enervated, enfeebled, healing, mental, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralysis, poison, stun
Defensive Ability Desc: Like other objects, an animated object has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount of damage equal to the Hardness. The construct armor takes damage equal to the attack’s damage, and might become dented or broken. The construct’s AC and TAC might be lower when it’s broken. The construct armor can’t be entirely destroyed since it’s part of the creature’s construction.
Offensive/Proactive Ability Descs: A creature hit by the broom’s bristles must succeed at a DC 13 Fortitude save or spend its next action coughing. Even if hit by multiple dust attacks, the creature has to spend only 1 action coughing to clear the dust out. A creature that doesn’t breathe is immune to this effect.

Name: Drow Fighter
Saving throw bonuses: +1 conditional to saves vs. magic, +2 conditional to saves vs. mental

Name: Drow Noble Cleric
Saving throw bonuses: +1 conditional to saves vs. magic, +2 conditional to saves vs. mental

Name: Night Hag
Saving throw bonuses: +2 conditional to saves vs. magic, -2 to saves if hearthstone is missing

Name: Norn
Saving throw bonuses: +4 conditional to saves vs. death, +1 conditional to saves vs. magic, +4 conditional to saves vs. mental

Name: Rakshasa
Saving throw bonuses: +2 conditional to saves vs. magic, +3 conditional to saves vs. divine magic

Name: Serpentfolk
Saving throw bonuses: +1 conditional to saves vs. magic, +4 conditional to saves vs. mental

Name: Degenerate Serpentfolk
Saving throw bonuses: +1 conditional to saves vs. magic, +4 conditional to saves vs. mental

Name: Sinspawn
Saving throw bonuses: +1 conditional to saves vs. magic, +4 conditional to saves vs. mental

Name: Thanatotic Titan
Saving throw bonuses: +3 conditional to saves vs. mental. +2 conditional to saves vs. divine

Name: Yeti
